content: {"name": "Wharton United Community Church at St. John's", "alternate_name": "", "description": "There is a strict process that they must follow as far as filling out grocery request forms due on the Saturday before their Wednesday pick-up.  This allows the volunteers time to prepare their order.  Blank forms are located outside of the church around the left side of the building by the pantry pick-up door.  There are 2 marked mailboxes there -- one with blank forms and one for their completed forms.  Any completed forms left after the due date/time noted on the form will not be processed until the following Pantry date.  They MUST provide a phone number so the volunteers can reach them to schedule their pick-up time.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.whartonucc.org/hopes-table.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20 Church Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Wharton", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07885", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8982817, "longitude": -74.5805163}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 366-8140", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must have email address and a phone number to arrange orders"}]}
